snippet.title: AlCHeMoS Game Trailer - Wishlist on Steam - Coming Feb 2022!
snippet.description:
The Matter and Anti-Matter Authority urgently need your help!

Something has happened to all the data and materials in the Elemental Archives!

No scientific knowledge required, on-the-job training provided. Post available Feb 2022

Please Apply Here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1090590/AlCHeMoS/?utm_source=youtube

---

AlCHeMoS is an Atomic Exploration Shooter game about alchemy. Take control of a Proto-Atomic Shell to explore protein structures, search for sub-atomic particles to discover elements, and combat the forces of Dark Matter!

Featuring:
Dynamic music and sounds
Raymarched graphics with realtime lights, shadows, reflection and more
Built on scientific data - from protein structures, to radioactive nuclei and atomic radii
Steam Friends Leaderboards, Achievements and stats

Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1090590/AlCHeMoS/?utm_source=youtube

AlCHeMoS Discord:
https://discord.gg/invite/t8UTyXe
